content: SPX Turbo diamond cup wheel Ultimate diamond cup wheel for angle grinders – for finishing grinding concrete and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Creates a smooth surface finish using a fine abrasive diamond mixture Engineered to last longer – helping you to get more done with the same cup wheel Low vibration – advanced core balancing technology helps you to keep firm control of the angle grinder Turbo rim – designed to give faster grinding speeds with lower vibration Applications Finishing grinding of concrete and natural stone Concrete surfacing using angle grinders ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder Base material: Concrete, Natural stone Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Cordless angle grinder, Corded angle grinder | Base material | Concrete, Natural stone | Product Class | Ultimate | Arbor size | 5/8 in ### ITEMS- 2242388 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 4 1/2 SPX turbo - Package Size 1 pc - 2242389 - Diamond cup wheel DG-CW 5 SPX turbo - Package Size 1 pc
